description:
Zenkichi is down 9 points.  One more point against him and he has to quit the Student Council.  What can a normal person do against a Judo genius?  Medaka sends the newest member of the Student Council on their first suggestion box assignment, the results raises question if they are prepared to be a part of Medaka’s Student Council.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Docchi Yanen!! / Negai ga Aru Nara
Make Your Choice!! / If You`re Going to Make a Wish...
どっちやねん!! / 願いがあるなら
